simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Implements the Noop command that demonstrates the CI task is alive

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_CI_CMDACTPCNT - command counter will increment
The CI_CMD_INF_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is received

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Resets the ci housekeeping counters

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
- command counter will be cleared
$sc_$cpu_CI_CMDRJCTCNT - command error counter will be cleared
The CI_CMD_INF_EID debug event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Authorizes a 2-step command

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
The CI_CMD_AUTHORIZED_EID info event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Command to authorize not 2-step
Command to authorize not registered
Command to authorize already authorized

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Deauthorizes a 2-step command

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
The CI_CMD_DEAUTHORIZED_EID info event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Command to deauthorize not 2-step
Command to deauthorize not registered
Command to deauthorize not authorized

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Registers a command with CI config table

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
The CI_CMD_REGISTERED_EID info event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Command to register already registered
Config table is full

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Deregisters a command in CI config table

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
The CI_CMD_DEREGISTERED_EID info event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Command to register not registered

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Updates the command registration in the CI config table

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
The CI_CMD_UPDATE_REG_EID info event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected
Command to register not registered

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None
